sentences.en: Taking up a candlestick, he touched the wick to a lighted taper.
sentences.cn: 他举起烛台，触摸一根燃着的蜡烛的烛芯。

sentences.en: The people in the stands at Candlestick Park are standing and cheering with all their might.
sentences.cn: 烛台公园看台上的人们正站着尽情欢呼。

sentences.en: He shall order the lamps upon the pure candlestick before the LORD continually.
sentences.cn: 他要在耶和华面前常收拾精金灯台上的灯。
